oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Hilbert series of Pfaffian rings
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: GHORPADE, SR
KRATTENTHALER, C
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: determinantal varieties
lattice paths
ideals
formula
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We give three determinantal expressions for the Hilbert series as well as the Hilbert function of a Pfaffian ring, and a closed form product formula for its multiplicity. An appendix outlining some basic facts about degeneracy loci and applications to multiplicity formulae for Pfaffian rings is also included.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: ALGEBRA, ARITHMETIC AND GEOMETRY WITH APPLICATIONS: PAPERS FROM SHREERAM S ABHYANKARS 70TH BIRTHDAY CONFERENCE,337-356
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Conference on Algebra, Arithmetic, Geometry and its Applications,W LAFAYETTE, IN,JUL 20-26, 2000
